scenario.title: Title: SUSI and Financial Support Narrative: As a parent I want to find out information about SUSI grants and the other financial supports UL offer for students So I can decide if UL is right for my son/daughter Acceptance Criteria: Scenario 1: Contact information regarding SUSI grants
scenario.step: Given that the desktop website is displayed
When I click on the "Contact Us" option from the home page
And I click the option for Financial Supports
Then I can call the contact number for queries Scenario 2: Student supports information
Given that the desktop website is displayed
When I click on the "Study at UL" option from the home page
And I click the option for Student Supports
Then I can see the available supports for students
